Amsu (Shenzhen) new technology Corps was founded in 2015, focusing on using wearable technologies to track accurate health parameters. We aim to provide the best health monitoring and coaching with the best convenience and comfort.
Amsu (Shenzhen) New Technology all right reserved
aim to build the top of notch exercise community, and provide sports enthusiasts an exclusiveplatform for sharing ideas and meeting new friends
Testing ECG. Are you sure to quit?
Running. Are you sure to quit?
You have a lot of energy, but is very mentally fatigue. Please relax, take a break from work and do more exercise.
You have a lot of energy, but is slightly mentally fatigue. Please start exercise more.
You have a well balance life with plenty of energy. Keep doing the good work.
You are slightly physically tired, but you have a good mood. It is aa good time for you to explore more opportunities and find the right inspiration.
You are physically exhausted, please don’t not over exhaust yourself. Take a break, do some stretch for the body to recover.
Error. Unable to get analysis results.
Heart rate too fast: for a healthy individual,stress and other factor could lead to fast heart rate. Please have enough rest, keep a happy mood, and consult to your doctor when it gets worse.
Heart rate too slow: it is normal for a healthy individual, but consult to your doctor if it gets worse.

times. Sometimes it is normal for a healthy individual to have premature beat. If it gets worse, consult your doctor.
times. Sometimes it is normal for a healthy individual to have premature beat. If it gets worse, consult your doctor.
You are doing very well, but need to keep with the same exercise schedule, otherwise, performance will go down.
You are doing well, please keep the same exercise schedule, otherwise, other people will catch up with you.
You are doing well, but need to keep the same exercise schedule in order to improve.
You are above average, but need to keep exercise a habit to stay in shape.
Your are about average, and there is room for improvement. Please exercise more.
Please add more cardio to start getting into shape.
Heart recovery rate collection error or no data

Heart rate reserve is the difference of maximum heart rate and resting heart rate, and it is closely related to the resistance during exercise. The higher the heart rate reserve, the better the resistance.

heart rate recovery: after intense exercise, the decrease of heart rate in the next 3 minutes. In general, the healthier the individual, the larger the heart rate drop; the faster the heart rate drop, the better recovery of the individual for another intense training. Therefore, it is useful for assessing health.
heart rate variability can derive a lot of health indicators, one of the most used ones is physical fatigue index (SDNN) and mood and mental index (LF/HF).
normal individual heart rate is 45–105 beat/min, heart rate too slow is less than 45; heart rate too fast is greater than 105 beat/min.

Premature heartbeat is the most frequent arrhythmia, which is caused by an ectopic pacemaker. If there is a short shot, it is a leak, which is usually a combination of premature beat. Frequent premature beat will damage the function of the myocardium, induce myocardial ischemia, some premature beat can also induce ventricular tachycardia and fibrillation

We use the time of exercise each week to assess your health reserve, and help you customizean exercise plan. We recommend 30 mins of cardio each day, 60 mins the best, and accumulatively 420 mins per week, but not exceeding 90 minutes per ay.

(body mass index, referred to as BMI), is obtained by weight in kilograms divided by height in meters squared figure, is a commonly used measure body fat levels and whether the international health is one of the important standards.

We used captured ECG data and advanced data analysis to index heart rate reserve, heart rate recovery, fatigue indicator, abnormal heart rate, health reserved, etc. and the higher the index score, the healthier you are.
You are on the thinner side, and your BMI index is very low. Please add more nutrition to your diet and exercise to increase your weight in a healthier way.
You are a little thin, and please consult with a nutritionist if you wish to improve.
You are too thin, and please consult with a physician.
You have a very satisfactory BMI. Keep it up!
You BMI is slightly high, please refrain from taking fat in your diet and get better balanced diet. Exercise will also help.
Your BMI is extremely high, please refrain from taking fat in your diet and actively engage in exercises.
Your BMI is well above average, but it doesn’t matter as long as you keep a happy mood and actively participate in all kinds of exercises.
Please increase your cardio to get into shape.
Your current BMI is enviable. Keep doing the good job.
You are the best. Keep up with the good work.
You are very good. Please keep the training intensity and enjoy a healthy living.
Excellent. Please keep the good job.
You are outstanding, but there is room for improvement!
Your health is above average, but need to keep exercising to stay in shape.
Your health reserve is at an average level and there is still room for improvement! Let\'s improve our training!
Don\'t let you look down, please increase the aerobic training, the road ahead will be long, I will seek!
You are doing very well, but need to keep with the same exercise schedule, otherwise, performance will go down.
You are doing well, but need to keep the same exercise schedule in order to improve.
You are doing very well, but need to keep with the same exercise schedule, otherwise, performance will go down.
Your HRR is in average and there is still room for improvement! Please increase training intensity!
It seems that you cannot afford a modest increase in exposed to wind and rain, please aerobic training, improve the quality of the body is the most important
You are full of energy. The hardest exercise means nothing to you.
You are very well, and you can increase the intensity of your training.
There is room for improvement, and you can start with some light exercises.
You can start with some cardio and you will feel much better soon.
looks you are exhausted, please take a rest.
your heart rate is great, please keep exercising.
your heart rate is on the slow side. If you exercise often, the slow rate means you have very good heart function.
You have a tendency to slow your heart rate. It may be normal if you take regular high load exercise.
your heart rate is slightly high, please increase your cardio to improve your heart and lungs.
your heart rate is slow, but it is mostly normal. Please consult with your physician.
You have very high heart rate, please increase your exercise to improveyour heart and lungs.
There is no evidence of premature heart beat. Your heart is great and please keep the current intensity.
It is likely that stress, cigarettes, alcohol, bad lifestyle, lack of sleep can lead to this condition. If it is very rare, please don’t worry and slightly slow down your exercise.

the occasional premature beat can be seen in normal people, more frequent loss of Bo, if there is no such as dizziness, fatigue, fainting, and even angina feel, you do not need to worry too much. Aerobic exercises can be performed to improve cardiopulmonary function.

Your heart function is not optimistic. It is recommended to have a detailed ECG examination in the hospital. Please pay attention to whether the heart feels uncomfortable or not. Moderate exercise, work and rest.
your heart has a pathological risk, I suggest you go to the hospital for detailed ECG examination as soon as possible. Exercise is risky. Please reduce the intensity of exercise!
The occasional premature beat can be seen in normal people, and there is no need to worry.
Is it necessary to collect one minute of ECG data to calculate the recovery of heart rate?
Your heart rate is very good, not too slow, please keep exercising.
You have a heart rate low, bradycardia may. Suggest you go to the hospital to listen to the doctor\'s professional advice.

You have a heart rate low phenomenon, may be due to illness or rational drug induced bradycardia. I hope you will go to the hospital for professional examination and diagnose and remove it as soon as possible.
Your heart rate is very good. There is no excessive speed. Please keep exercising.

You have a higher heart rate phenomenon, such as running, drinking, not because of the heavy physical labor and emotional lead rhythm accelerate, there may be tachycardia caused by disease, suggest to the hospital to listen to the doctor\'s professional advice

You have a higher heart rate phenomenon, such as running, drinking, not because of the heavy physical labor and emotional lead rhythm accelerate, there may be tachycardia caused by disease, suggest to the hospital to listen to the doctor\'s professional advice.
No premature beats are found. Your heart is excellent and can maintain the current training intensity.

It is found that continuous premature beat 1-3 times, your heart function is not optimistic, it is recommended to go to the hospital for detailed ECG examination, please pay attention to whether the heart has any discomfort

In the known test period, found that continuous premature beat more than 3 times, your heart has a pathological risk, suggest you go to the hospital as soon as possible for detailed ECG examination. Please pay attention to whether the heart feels uncomfortable or not.
There is no leakage. Your heart is excellent and can keep the current training intensity.

usually due to mental stress, excessive alcohol and tobacco, irregular life, lack of night rest and so on. If there is only a feeling of cardiac leakage, no other symptoms such as dizziness, fatigue, fainting or even angina pectoris, it is important to adjust the pace of life, maintain good habits, and do not have to worry too much.
The resting heart rate is being collected
It takes a minute, please wait a moment
Running time or distance is too short to keep records. Do you want to continue running?
Whether to open web ECG monitoring
You are full of spirit, it is a good opportunity to play your wisdom, think about yourself and those unresolved problems, maybe the inspiration is in front of you.
You\'re in good mental shape now, and you can keep your current mental activities.
You are now mentally tired, try to put down the work, rest, relieve fatigue bar.
You are very tired now, this will affect your work efficiency, suggest that you properly reduce mental work, leave the desk to release yourself!
You are now full of physical fitness, physical exercise now will be able to achieve good results, go for some exercise.
You are now more physical exertion, it is recommended that you do not do physical exercise, proper rest bar.
Your physical strength seems to have been depleted, please do not over overdraft their physical strength, relax your tired body!
You just a small amount of exercise, physical fitness is relatively adequate, you can also continue to moderate physical exercise, to achieve better exercise effect.
Your physical energy consumption is large, it is recommended that you rest properly, work and rest in order to achieve the best exercise effect.
Your physical strength has been exhausted, pay attention to not excessive overdraft of their physical fitness, stop the exercise, rest.
You are in a good state of mind now, and continue to exercise or to relax and relax.

When you are in a relaxed mood, you can\'t disturb you when you have a rest.

Your body is full of vitality.
Your body is full of vitality, but the spirit is very tired, appropriate to do some high strength physical exercise, work and rest to maintain physical and mental health!
Your body is full of vitality, but the spirit is very tired, appropriate to do some high strength physical exercise, work and rest to maintain physical and mental health!
Your body is in good condition, but the spirit is a little tired. Don\'t think too much of it, and adjust it through some physical training.

Your body seems to be tired, but it is just the time when you are active in your mind. It\'s a good opportunity to give full play to your intelligence and talents, and do something light weight and mental exercise.
You look tired, you need to rest, but you have a vibrant brain, think about yourself and those unsolved problems. Maybe inspiration is in front of you.

耐力测试将采用12分钟倒计时跑的形式进行，\n请在开始后的12分钟内尽力冲刺更长的距离，\n计时结束后系统将会有语音提示。
